msbt.message: Hello, and welcome aboard Jolly Redd's Treasure Trawler! How are ya?The name's Redd. I work in sales. And you are<10_4 /> !What a great name! Intelligent. Strong. I can already tell we're gonna be pals. No, not palsfamily! It's a pleasure to meet ya, !

So here's the pitch. Ready? At Jolly Redd's Treasure Trawler, we sell only the finest.And there's nothing finer than fine art and rare furniture, am I right?Of course, I can't let all these fine things just walk out the door. I gotta limit you to one piece of art per day.But tell you what! Since we're family, practically cousins, even, you're gonna getthe Cousin's Discount!Plus, I'll let you buy all the furniture you want, no questions asked.
So take a look around. We've got masterpieces by the great masters, plus stuff for your master bedroom.Let me know if you have any questions.
Ah, ! I'm so glad you made it!
Look at that! ! You found me!It means a lot to me that you came. Did I mention the Cousin's Discount yet? 'Cause you're gettin' it!
I'd know that shining face anywhere. How ya been, ?You made the right choice buyin' that art from me earlier. I've had a lot of folks asking about it, cousin.
Well, if it isn't ! Long time no see!

You know, I gotta be real honest. I kinda think I'm fallin' for .I mean, wants art, and I got art to sell. Might be something to this.But I couldn't sell to just anybody. I'd need someone I could trust. Completely. As if they were familyAnd since we're basically cousins And because I know you've got an eye for quality I want it to be you!

So here's the pitch. Ready? At Jolly Redd's Treasure Trawler, we sell only the finest.And there's nothing finer than fine art and rare furniture, am I right?Of course, I can't let all these fine things just walk out the door. I gotta limit you to one piece of art per day.It's a hassle, I know. But I hope the Cousin's Discount will make up for it.Plus, I'll let you buy all the furniture you want, no questions asked.
So take a look around. We've got masterpieces by the great masters, plus stuff for your master bedroom.Let me know if you have any questions.
You have an eye for quality! That's Oh, we haven't met. Welcome aboard Jolly Redd's Treasure Trawler!
The name's Redd. I work in sales. And you are<10_4 /> !What a great name! Intelligent. Strong. I can already tell we're gonna be pals. No, not palsfamily! It's a pleasure to meet ya, !

So here's the pitch. Ready? At Jolly Redd's Treasure Trawler, we sell only the finest.And there's nothing finer than fine art and rare furniture, am I right?Of course, I can't let all these fine things just walk out the door. I gotta limit you to one piece of art per day.But tell you what! Since we're family, practically cousins, even, you're gonna getthe Cousin's Discount!Plus, I'll let you buy all the furniture you want, no questions asked.
Well, if it isn't ! It's been a while!

You know, I gotta be real honest. I kinda think I'm fallin' for .I mean, wants art, and I got art to sell. Might be something to this.But I couldn't sell to just anybody. I'd need someone I could trust. Completely. As if they were familyAnd since we're basically cousins And because I know you've got an eye for quality I want it to be you!

So here's the pitch. Ready? At Jolly Redd's Treasure Trawler, we sell only the finest.And there's nothing finer than fine art and rare furniture, am I right?Of course, I can't let all these fine things just walk out the door. I gotta limit you to one piece of art per day.But tell you what Have I mentioned the Cousin's Discount yet? 'Cause you're gettin' it!Plus, I'll let you buy all the furniture you want, no questions asked.
So yeah, that about covers it. Now how about we talk about what you were lookin' at.
Well, if it isn't my favorite cousin. Glad to have you back aboard Jolly Redd's Treasure Trawler!
Oh, store policy—I know it, you know it. We have a limit of one art piece per customer per day. Choose wisely!
We've had a run on art today and stock is dwindling. You'd better act fast before it's all gone!
Unfortunately, my last piece of art JUST walked off the boat. I still have some furniture though. Take a look!
You won't regret it!<10_7 arg="60" />
Come again!<10_7 arg="60" />
Thanks.<10_7 arg="60" />
I won't lie. An awful lot of folks have been asking me about buyin' that there.But maybe the price scared 'em off, soI'll sell it to ya for . Deal of the . You in?
You got a deal!
I want a closer look.
No, thanks.

Wow, you really know your art. You can just FEEL the aura on that , huh?I mean, you couldn't buy that kind of aura! Well, YOU could. And should! Let me help you out.With my Cousin's Discount, you can have it for only . Normally I'd charge 10 times as much!
You got a deal!
I want a closer look.
No, thanks.

Y'know, I catch myself staring at that a lot.Honestly, I just wish someone would buy it so I could get more work done.I really shouldn'tbut I'm gonna add the Discount on top of the Cousin's Discount.That'll bring the price aaaall the way down to. Come on, help a cousin out!
You got a deal!
I want a closer look.
No, thanks.

So you think you want , huh?Believe it or not, that's actually my favorite piece in here. I really don't wanna sell it, butit's you.OK, on top of the Cousin's Discount and Discount I'll waive shipping too.That drags the price down to a mere . Whaddaya say?
You got a deal!
I want a closer look.
No, thanks.
Can't get that one out of your mind? I know just what that's like. But I say why get it out of your mind at all?My offer's still good, y'know. For only , this magnificent is yours!
You got a deal!
I want a closer look.
No, thanks.

Wanna buy maybe the finest piece I've ever had in stock? Well, this is it.I could charge you what it's worth, but I'm not gonna do that to you. We're cousins, after all!So with the Cousin's Discount, I'm practically going to give it away for only . How's that sound?
You got a deal!
I want a closer look.
No, thanks.
Admiring the detail? Can't blame you. It's extremelydetailed. Brilliant stuff.And the best part? All that detail could be yours for just !
Sold!
I don't know...
I understand, I understand. It's a lot to take in all at once. No rush.
I get it—it's a big decision. Take your time and look around some more. I'll be here.
Butyou don't have enough Bells. Look, I love hagglin', but I still gotta keep my shop afloat, y'know?
Ha! You are NOT gonna regret this. I'll just take those Bells from you
Yep, it's all there. Congratulations! You are now the proud owner of !
Been a pleasure doin' business with you, cousin! I'll get your art packed up and shipped out tomorrow.

Don't worry, we'll get that shipped out to you as quick as we can.I'm even gonna skip shipping insurance. All the paperwork just slows things down, y'know?Sure is a beauty, isn't it? Did you wanna get a closer look while it's still here?
Yes, please!
No, that's fine.
Gorgeous, huh? I actually just sold this to .Hey, how'd you like to get a closer look before I gotta box it up?
Yes, please!
No, that's fine.
Beautiful, eh? from bought that .I'm gonna have to box it up pretty soon. You wanna get a closer look before I do?
Yes, please!
No, that's fine.
It's really hard to resist that , isn't it?But store policy is one art purchase per customer per day. You can look all you want though!
I'll take a look!
No, thanks.

It's just amazing how easily that draws the eye, isn't it?But our policy is one art purchase per customer per day, even if you bought at another anchorage.Of course, there's no harm in lookin', is there?
I'll take a look!
No, thanks.
One glance and suddenly it's like you've known the artist for years. Gonna be sad to see this one go.
No problem at all! Please take a look at the rest of our stock, and let me know if you have any questions.
The charm and elegance of the very finest , wrapped up into Much as I wanna charge ya full price, I had a real tasty earlier, so How about ?
It's a deal!
No, thanks.
Like the best albums, it's impossible to get enough of .Tell ya what—and this is just 'cause it's my favorite weather out there Yours for !
It's a deal!
No, thanks.
So you still got your eyes on , huh?Y'know, my offer still stands. All yours for a mere !
It's a deal!
No, thanks.
If you wanted to buy this 's hottest style, look no further than .OK, usually I would only give out the Cousin's Discount for art, but watch this Yours for only !
It's a deal!
No, thanks.
Really?! Well, it's your decision. These kinds of deals don't come around every day though!
Butyou don't have enough Bells. Look, I love hagglin', but I still gotta keep my shop afloat, y'know?
Ha! That's what I wanna Wait a minute. You don't have any room in your pockets, cousin!Look, a bargain like this may never come around again. Go clear some space so we can seal the deal!
Yes! That's the right choice. I'll just get those Bells from you
Yep, ! It's all there. Been a real pleasure doin' business with ya!
Thank you so much for comin' aboard. Take a look around and let me know if you have questions.

You've got a real instinct for deals, you know that?I've lost count of how many folks come on board, then walk off in tears when they can't get a deal they like.But you? You know when to pounce. I knew I was right about you, cousin.
I know how much you wanna get that art home, but you gotta be patient.We'll box it up real carefully and get it to you quick as we can. Meanwhile, why not have another look around?
Art this delicate's gotta be handled with care, which is why my prices always include the cost of shipping.What's with the look? You didn't think shipping was free, didja?
Buying art is all about love at first sight and going with your gut, don'tcha think?And yeah, sometimes that means you end up with something you weren't expectin', but that's the magic of it!

Let me tell ya, selling art is a tough business.The other day someone came aboard, accused me of selling 'em a fake, and wanted a refund. Can you believe it?Alright, so firstly, word of mouth is everything in this business. That kind of talk could sink me!Secondly, we don't take complaints here. Those're for our complaints department, whose number I forgetAnd thirdly, it clearly states on the delivery slip that all sales are final. No refunds.So I don't know what their problem was.<10_4 /> I mean, how was it MY fault they didn't know what they were buyin'?

What a day! I sold every piece of art I brought with me. Should've gotten here earlier if you wanted some.But don't let that get you down. I've still got some rare furniture I'd be happy to cut a deal on!

The art's been flying off the shelves today. I'm down to my last piece, and even that's been drawin' interest.What I'm getting at is you should act fast if you came here lookin' to buy yourself some art.
No touching the art, please. But if you see somethin' you're interested in, feel free to take a closer look.Just, you know, keep the closeness of that look within reason

I actually started out selling furniture. I didn't get into dealin' art until much later.Then I just sold art for a while, but It's important to remember where you came from, y'know?Now I'm selling both. I gotta say, it's amazing just how much selling one teaches you about selling the other.
I love seeing a customer's eyes light up when they see somethin' they want. Makes it all worth it.But don't get me wrong, the Bells are pretty nice too.
You wouldn't believe how much interest there is in this stuff. It even surprises me sometimes!If you see something that's callin' out to you, jump on it. I'm always ready to cut a deal.

When you've been at this as long as I have, you start to figure out a few things.Such as knowin' exactly what your customer wants and what a good deal looks like to them.If you give customers a deal good enough to make 'em think they're happy, they'll keep you in business!
You came all the way here just to buy from me? Wow It's a shame I'm all out of discounts to give ya!
Just you wait. Next time I come to , I'm bringin' my top-shelf deals!
You're a long way from home, cousin. Remember, deals today are gone tomorrow, so don't wait!
Let me know if you see somethin' you like, and I'll cut you a deal on a nice souvenir.
